hooks.description: Capture all DBIS transaction requests and approvals.
Gate DBIS settlement finality on EOAG audit clearance.
Record treasury disbursements, mints, and burns with evidence.
Require EOAG clearance before treasury settlement finality.
Log EFCTIA pre-settlement audit checkpoint and approvals.
Capture EFCTIA post-settlement audit and finality receipts.
Audit governance decisions, votes, and policy ratifications.
Ensure all transaction-bearing entities emit EOAG audit hooks.

separation_of_duties: Auditors cannot approve or execute settlements.
Auditors cannot author the transactions they review.
Audit leads rotate independently of operational leadership.
conflict_checks: Confirm no shared key custody between auditors and operators.
Validate disclosures for any personal or financial ties.
Enforce dual-control for audit log access and export.
recusal_triggers: Direct participation in the audited transaction or vote.
Recent employment or advisory role with the audited entity.
Family or financial relationship with transaction beneficiaries.
